title: Did people feel they were given enough time to discuss their condition and treatment?
analysis_commentary: The proportion of people who felt they had enough time to discuss their condition or treatment has been above 90% in every year. Only 9% of people felt they didnâ€™t have enough time in 2013 which was a significant increase from 8% in 2012. Those who felt they definitely had enough time decreased significantly in 2013, from 72% in 2012 to 70% in 2013.
data_source: Care Quality Commission, Community Mental Health Survey
